amendatorysection.catchline: Liens upon undivided interests; lien for costs paramount.
amendatorysection.para: If the lien is upon one or more undivided interests of any of the parties, it shall, after partition or sale, remain a charge upon those particular interests or the proceeds thereof. But the due proportion of costs is a charge upon those interests paramount to all other liens.

annotation.para: Proceeds are not exempt as personalty against judgment lien. First Nat. Bank of Albion v. Snyder, 2 Neb. Unof. 136, 96 N.W. 285 (1901).
